website_summaries.verdict: These bags are practical, user-friendly, and affordable, which make them the best choice for consumers who are trying to be eco-conscious on a budget.
pros: A generous collection of 15 bags in 3 different sizes
Constructed of sheer polyester mesh that is transparent and easy to scan at the grocery store, plus the material is easy to wash and reuse
cons: Don't seem to maintain the freshness of some green, leafy vegetables
Drawstrings don't always stay securely closed

customer_reviews.title: These are the best I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: We are those hippie peeps that take canvas bags to the grocery store. We also take produce bags. We have purchased several kinds in the past but they each disappointed in one way or another. Not these! These bags are sturdy, come in great sizes, and have drawstring locks that actually, ya know, lock. A friend of mine has fruit fly issues during the summer sometimes and I'm going to gift her with a set of these - the mesh is fine enough to keep them out!
customer_reviews.author: J. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: But they arrived in a plastic bag! Oh the irony.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to limit my use of plastic bags when buying vegetables at the grocery store. But to deliver in a plastic bag? Sort of unclear on the concept. Other than that, they're great. Sturdy, good mix of sizes and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: stacyo

customer_reviews.title: Worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: The item comes as described with locking drawstring closures and the tare weights on the tags. For vegetables like garlic and onion they worked wonderfully. For others like lettuce, cucumbers, green beans, peppers, etc. the food becomes wilted or spoiled much sooner than it would if it was kept in a plastic bag or container. If you use your vegetables soon after purchasing them or you keep them in another container they are still a great purchase because you don't have you use plastic bags from the store. If I need to keep something in a plastic bag I just reuse bags from loaves of bread or some other food item.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie C

customer_reviews.title: Wrong tare weights
customer_reviews.text: This product concept isn't very tough. A lightweight bag that you can put grocery items in. The plastic knob is annoying and not really needed if you can just tie a slipknot - but it is there. And thus, it has weight. And thus, they put the tare on the label for the cashier to not charge you extra for the weight of the plastic knob. Except they wrote the tare in ounces and no one knows how to convert ounces to pounds because we in America stubbornly refuse to go metric.
customer_reviews.author: robynanne

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: I love the different sizes and they are so light, it doesn't affect the price of my produce. If you have a small grocers, they could deduct the bag weight (it's on the bag) but the big chains won't. I keep them in my reusable bags in the car so I always have them, but I've thrown a couple into my purse when I just needed that one thing. Durable, light, easy to clean, drawstring closure that stays closed. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: These do a good job when getting fruits and vegetables. I love that you can tighten the cords. And they seem to keep produce fresher longer. They also wash quite well. I tuck the pull inside and then tighten before washing and I let them air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Lady

customer_reviews.title: Plastic to replace plastic???
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it when companies advertise a product as eco friendly but the product is. not. Yes using these saves plastic bags but these bags are all made out of plastic which depletes the purpose and does not help you get to a zero waste lifestyle like this company advertises. It's my own fault... I didn't look close enough and I didn't do my research. But basically these are polyester bags (plastic) with plastic draw string clips... It's all plastic. If I buy more bags in the future I will be sure to get from a better company that actually sells eco bags... Like cotton bags without plastic clips.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Reusable, less plastic waste!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. Came perfectly packaged and used the next day. Used them on multiple produce items, brought them home, washed them in the bag, and put in the fridge. Two people stopped me in the store to ask me about them!
customer_reviews.author: lexie lorencz

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: These should do well. I’ve used them a few times. The cord could be a little shorter to cut down on weight but it’s good. I got these primarily to save time. I was spending a lot of time in the store tracking down, unrolling and opening the plastic produce bags. I’m pretty sure these are faster. Although, I do ‘green bag’ the kale when I get home or it dries out.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't use them to store veggies in your refrigerator!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these bags were going to be a good solution for storing my veggies in my crisper drawer in my refrigerator (3 year old refrigerator and I tried adjusting the humidity setting to try and solve the issue) but unfortunately they caused condensation to build up in my drawer and the veggies did not last nearly as long as the plastic bags you get in the store. I paid $75 for a warranty issue with my refrigerator to only find out it was these bags that were causing the condensation issue once I removed the veggies from the bags problem went away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not keep vegetables fresh
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the green produce bags, thought I would try these. I put lettuce in one and it wilted in a few days, The lettuce I put in the green produce bag lasted 2+ weeks. They did work for small travel items, even if that is not the intended use.
customer_reviews.author: jth22321

customer_reviews.title: So Practical!
customer_reviews.text: I've gave this product a try for a month and I've gotta say its great! They're easy to use and seal, the packaging was nice and simple as well. The mesh makes washing my fruits and veggies easier and I can wash this bags as well. I personally don't store my produce in bags so I have no complaints about them going bad more quickly. I'd highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Selene

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing bags! I received them the other day and got to use them for the first time today and so many sizes which are perfect. They scan easy and keep everything inside great. They do not affect weight when weighing an item
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Great produce bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in an effort to reduce my disposable plastic usage. They are awesome! The cashier could scan my items right through the bag. I keep them in the Jeep with my cloth grocery bags so they are easy to grab for shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S

customer_reviews.title: Mesh produce bags
customer_reviews.text: Why did I not purchased this ages before? I am honestly tired of bringing home produce plastics. This helps on so many levels. The material is durable and washes&dries well. And, because I love it so much, I purchased two more packs for extra things all over...like keeping my son’s toys organized for easy play. No more digging here and there.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyGo93

customer_reviews.title: An investment in our future
customer_reviews.text: The most sobering fact I’ve heard in awhile is that the plastic bag you use once to carry your produce home will live longer than your grandchildren. We’ve got to stop our addiction to plastic now, while we can. These bags are a wonderful reusable resource. They offer a variety of useful sizes, and seem to be very well made. The cashiers at the grocery stores are all impressed, and I’m now a true believer that this needs to be everyone’s choice. Come on, people, we can do this...we must do this...
customer_reviews.author: Martha & Jim

customer_reviews.title: Save the sea turtles 🐢
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! They are perfect for grocery shopping and going to the farmers market. Parts of NY are charging for bags, and this is a great start for the produce bags. They are super sturdy and easy to clean. Just throw it in the washing machine and they are clean. I wouldn’t suggest putting it in the drier I would air dry them. They are super light weight and love that they come in three different sizes. I would suggest purchasing these bags if you want to continue saving the planet, and use less plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Restrepo

customer_reviews.title: Bonus: cilantro doesn't spoil!
customer_reviews.text: Great for shopping, no more single use plastic veggie bags! Greatest plus is that I find all my veggies, esp delicate herbs like cilantro, last way longer in the fridge when I store in the mesh bags. They are synthetic (non biodegradable) but I've been using for a month an seems super sturdy after washing, so I expect to use them for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: NoSlouch

customer_reviews.title: Idea great - design and implementation were miserable disasters
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive these mesh produce bags....however, the first problem became evident when I wanted to pre-wash before I used them.....the wooden (or hard plastic) 'locks' on the bag strings accelerated tangling in the washer and then clanged to the point of distraction in the dryer....Next disappointment: stored lettuce in one and tomatoes in another in my veggie drawer. Within 1 day the lettuce was 'wilting' and the tomatoes were showing signs of dehydration or skin punk, as my mom used to call it. I'm trying to think of another use for these other than for their intended purpose...nothing is coming to mind so will ask to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Can Use These For Anything
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these. The quality is fantastic. You get several in this pack and so Im using them for my laundry to clean bras or delecates, I use them to store items that I have in big quantity. Ive stuck some of these into my cloth reusable shopping bags so I can pick up veggies and fruits. You cant go wrong with these! I love the drawstring on these as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlyrav

customer_reviews.title: THESE MESH BAGS ARE THE FINEST FOR STORAGE I HAVE EVER SEEN
customer_reviews.text: NO MATTER WHAT THE OBJECT......FOOD, MARBLES, MONEY, AND IN THE CASE OF THE LARGEST SIZE BAG, MAGAZINES OR BOOKS, THESE STORAGE BAGS ARE WONDERFUL AND I AM BUYING MORE OF THE LARGE SIZE OF WHICH I HAVE NEED. BE AWARE THAT IN BUYING THE LARGE SIZE, WHICH IS A FEW CENTS MORE THAN THE VARIETY PACK, DELIVERY WILL TAKE AT LEAST TWO WEEKS. THE VARIETY PACK ARRIVED IN ONE DAY. SO PERHAPS PURCHASE THIS FIRST, AND MAKE A SECOND ORDER FOR THE LARGE ONES. THE BAGS COME WITH A TIE STRING TO CLOSE EACH ONE, COLOR CODED, AND ARE WELL PACKAGED IN SHIPPING. REALLY, AN EXCELLENT PRODUCT, FOR ABOUT $8.50 PER PACK OF TEN ASSORTED BAGS. WHAT A BUY!
customer_reviews.author: WALT

customer_reviews.title: what a deal
customer_reviews.text: I got the reusable produce bags and the Yihong steel straws for FREE! They both had a buy one get the other free deal which cancelled each of them out. The bags are mesh produce bags that we'll use to transport things we buy at farmer's market/ grocery store. The straws are pretty thin but work as they should with a rounded end to protect your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Chantil

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adore
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled with these bags and use them frequently, both for shopping and food storage. There were enough bags in this bundle that we split them between my husband and I so that we'd always have them with us when shopping and we still have some in the fridge being used. We're able to scan at the register right through the bags which was a concern of mine prior to purchase. The true test was if my husband would actually use them - and he does! I'm still saying "I love these bags!" every time I use them and think about all the plastic bags we've not used and wasted.
customer_reviews.author: vwilly

customer_reviews.title: Using them for quite some time, and love them.
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've been using them for a while, for purchases ranging from a single bunch of cilantro to multiple pounds of potatoes, these bags have held up great. Kale, onion, sweet potatoes, avocado, limes, lemons....I could keep going, but having the different sizes allows me to fit anything I need in the bags I've got. The drawstrings are showing some questionable signs of durability, but even in the current state, I feel they'll last for well over a year still without ever being worried about things failing.
customer_reviews.author: dj walker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome REUSABLE produce bags!!
customer_reviews.text: So handy and it just feels nice to pull these out for produce at our local grocery store while others around me grab for the single use plastic. Had these bags for a few months and they have all held up well. We even used them for dry bulk foods such as rice/beans etc. I actually prefer these bags vs the single use plastic available. Someday those single use bags will be unavailable, in the meantime I hope more people choose to use products like these. Thanks Ecowaare! Joey M
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE these bags
customer_reviews.text: A large part of my grocery shopping now includes some pretty serious washing of everything I buy before I put anything away. With these bags, I can wash my fruits and vegetables while they are still in the bag. The bags do not absorb any water themselves, so everything dries quickly. Then I throw the produce, bags and all, into the refrigerator. They look great. The draw strings have a secure lock on them. The large size was large enough for a bag of potatoes and a monstrously large bok choy. The medium was good for grapefruit and apples. The small was perfect for zucchini and tomatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price to reduce plastic waste
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a few months since I’ve had this, and I definitely recommend it!! It’s honestly worth the price, helps reduce plastic waste, and it’s easy to clean, but I did have a stubborn stain from carrots that didn’t come out by just a simple hand wash, so I had to soak it in hot soapy water for a bit, then it came out. Overall, it’s an amazing product and I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: KXT

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for several different things. First, the small or middle size is perfect for putting used masks in and throwing in the laundry/washing machine, and then in the dryer. Keeps masks intact so they aren't getting intertwined in other clothing loose in the machines. Other sizes have come in handy for produce. And yet others I have used in the dishwasher for smaller objects that used to fall down through the rack spaces. Just make sure to secure the drawstrings. Once I pull them tight, I tuck them down in the bag and bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love these bags. I was starting to feel extremely guilty over the amount of plastic produce bags that we would accumulate just in one shopping trip. We have already switched to reusable shopping bags, so we made the switch to these as well! It took a few shopping trips to form the habit of bringing these, but we have it down and I’m feeling better about us contributing less waste. They are durable and have held up well. They even worn for bulk food items like rice, oats, nuts, and beans that we buy from the bulk bins at Sprouts. I love the drawstring with a little clasp to keep it in place and prevents spills.
customer_reviews.author: Muddy

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to reduce plastic
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My new year's resolution was to use less plastic, so I ordered some reusable grocery bags and these produce bags as well. They are so much easier to deal with at the store than the plastic bags, and the biggest one easily fits things like kale and celery bunches that are always slightly too big for the plastic bags. The cashiers have never had trouble ringing up my items through the bags. Highly highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Amazon purchases I have ever made!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW! This set of bags is one of the best Amazon purchases I have ever made, and I have made a lot. These bags are so durable and can be washed in the washing machine, they keep my produce items fresher longer than a plastic bag because they don't trap moisture. I have had several people ask me about them and I always recommend buying them, not only to help the environment but to help their dollar go further with produce that lasts longer! Product arrived quickly and I highly highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JillHdz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and can scan produce through bags. Worth the price 100%
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Replace the stores one-time-use bags with these
customer_reviews.text: As we continue to find ways to eliminate one-time-use items in our home, these bags have done just that. I no longer have to use the plastic produce bags at the store. These lightweight reusable produce bags come in handy every time I go to the store. I kick myself for not buying them sooner. I put them through the washing machine after each use with no problems. I will never go back to plastic bags again.
customer_reviews.author: Danny S Ellis

customer_reviews.title: A great find to preserve produce longer
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely so glad i discovered these!! My biggest issue has been lettuce/salad greens going bad way too quickly. I dumped a container of spinach in one of these bags, and it lasted 2-3 times longer than in those plastic clamshells. Air circulates through them, preventing the soggy, wilty, grossness that greens get. So i highly recommend getting these four all produce--veggies and fruits a like!
customer_reviews.author: ersufi

customer_reviews.title: Machine washable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these right at the start of the stay at home order because I knew we would be getting our groceries delivered and I wanted to make sure to remove our fruits and veggies from their plastic bags and clean them in a vinegar soak before storing them in the fridge. These have gone above and beyond what I wanted. I love how easy they are to clean. I just throw them in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie C.

customer_reviews.title: No Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for storing my fruit & veggies in the frig, instead of baggies which causes them to get mushy. This product allows the food to Dry out, which isn't any better. I should have sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Lane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for shopping and fruit/vegetable drawer storage
customer_reviews.text: We use these every weekend for groceries and the farmers market. Produce stays fresher longer when stored in these bags also. We wash them in the sink with warm soapy water in line dry them. They hold up well and are easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: VKS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These bags are so durable. I like the various sizes, they're easy to clean, and very handy when shopping. There were enough in the package that I was able to give some to my daughter and my sister. There are some stores near me where you have to bring your own bags or pay for one so it's great to have these. I've had compliments on them at the store. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: BookerMom

customer_reviews.title: They replace plastic vegetable and friut bags
customer_reviews.text: I liked using these bags. Please note , however, the grocery stores are slow learners. I have to tell each cashier to just scan through the mesh. The grocery packer just thinks they are small bags and packs in cans and bottles into the bags sometimes with your avocados and lettuce, even when there are large bags available. So watch what they are doing to your produce. The stores haven't quite made it to this type of bag yet. Maybe they need to be on TV once in while so everyone learns about them.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Silloway

customer_reviews.title: These are neat!
customer_reviews.text: Loving these bags! I take a handful into the store, use what I need & put the others back into my car after shopping. Once at home, I decide which ones need washing (maybe odors or color residue from produce) I was hesitant to purchase since I didn't want to pay for the weight of my own bags time & time again, but GOOD NEWS!!!! I weighed the largest bag while empty & it didn't even move the needle on the weigh scale in the store. Definitely made me happy! I definitely recommend these!!!
customer_reviews.author: prettymissjamie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for CSA pickups!
customer_reviews.text: We loved the assortments of sizes, and the ability to choose a size for any particular item- like, tomatillos need a smaller bag than, say a Napa cabbage. The drawstrings help to keep our CSA (Community Supported Agriculture) items separate and easy to store. I think they also have promise for grocery store veg, once the CSA stops in the fall. The mash means that veg will not rot in plastic. Our town has recently banned plastic carrier bags- for good reasons!- and these are a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: CissaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the closing device adding to much weight to my produce purchase; not a factor. The closing device is very light weight and durable. Even with covid-19 out and about I still use these washable bags. I am not a fan of plastic produce bags and these are a great item to use. (No, I don't hug trees or sea turtles.)
customer_reviews.author: Mad Cat Owner

customer_reviews.title: Eco friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else - I have no complaints for this product. Perfect alternative of plastic bags. Due to COVID-19, we are not allowed to use these reusable bags, so, I would use these as fruit/veggie storage bag for fridge. I cannot wait to use these again and reduce the plastic waste in the house. They are super easy to clean as well. I usually just risen them with warm soapy water and air dry. I’m happy with this purchase and would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: YH

customer_reviews.title: They pay for themselves
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I keep spinach in one bag, broccoli in one bag, cucumbers...the thing is, if your veggies are being stored in the plastic bags in which they were packaged, the produce is not going to get air and will rot! Spinach should not be kept in a static container! It will rot! Since I have been putting them in these bags, my produce has lasted so much longer than it had been! These bags have already paid for themselves! They were essentially free! And now they are making me money!
customer_reviews.author: Vicktory

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Organization Necessity
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought these. I am being really careful with the Covid situation and when transporting items from my vehicle to the house, these come in handy. I love that you can wash them in the washing machine. I re-use them all the time and wash them often and they are holding up like they're brand new. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Love the quantity, sizes, and colors strings for size identification.
customer_reviews.text: I like the quantity you get and the durability they seem to have. The string lock/closure is nice and quick for securing your produce in the bags. They have the weight of the bags on a tag but I have yet to go to a store that subtracts that from the total weight of the produce so if it is bought by weight you will spend a penny or two more per use, I don't fight or request they subtract the weight. Hoping they start to do it automatically once these become more prevalent. Anyway the wife and I love these when we remember to grab them from the car. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality  for small weight
customer_reviews.text: Te overall product quality is good . Here are pros and cons Pros: 1. Quality is good and cloth is smooth 2. Easy to clean and easy to store fruits or vegetables in refrigerator. 3. Value for money 4. Eco friendly product 5.Good Customer support Cons: 1. Can not use more than 3 lbs . 2. The bag is peeling or broke when we used more than 4 lbs in big bag . 3. The vegetable /friets colors was did not going after wash too . 4. We felt , We can not use bags for long term .
customer_reviews.author: A.K

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great reusable bags. I love the drawstring (which some bags don't have). Never any issues at checkout whether I scan it myself, or I go through a regular checkstand. I also think it keeps some produce fresher over time than with plastic - my asparagus lasted almost twice as long as when I've put it in plastic bags. And every time I use them, I feel proud that I'm doing my little part to reduce single-use plastic!
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: These bags were absolutely perfect. Just what I had been looking for. The price point was wonderful and while they are made out of plastic based fabric, being able to reuse them indefinitely is better than filling the landfill with single use bags in the supermarket. The design is sturdy, there are three sizes that accommodate anything one could imagine, and I am happy that I won’t have to order them again because of their good design, although I would as a gift, certainly.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Great for "saving the planet"
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for me and I think they are a great solution for purchasing loose produce and not having to use a plastic bag. I take these to the grocery with me each time. They come is numerous sizes which is perfect for whatever size and amount of produce you are buying. The UPC codes on the veggies can be read through these bags so no need to take them out at checkout. Great for storing your produce in the refrigerator and wash up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Chancey

customer_reviews.title: Please try these out
customer_reviews.text: I had no clue until recently that the little plastic bags that you get in the grocery store that holds your avocado or your fruit take a thousand years to decompose, and I am quite guilty of grabbing several of them without even a second thought, these are extremely easy to use very easy to clean, you can also store some of your vegetables in them allowing them to still breathe while they go in the fridge if you so desire. I absolutely love these I've purchased them for several members of my family so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Allen

customer_reviews.title: Cut plastic out with ease!
customer_reviews.text: I have found these bags to be very easy to use, and no issues checking out at different grocery stores. I like that there are three different sizes, and I have found each size is useful. Also find that the mesh bags are good for storing certain delicate things when I get home, like mushrooms. I get stopped repeatedly by other shoppers asking where they can get them, so hopefully in the future, plastic bag use will be greatly diminished.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Bartimole

customer_reviews.title: The plastic clip fell off the first time
customer_reviews.text: Also I didn't realize it had a plastic clip or I wouldn't have got these. It negates the purpose. They do just fine with out it on there. Slip knot the draw string.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tassin

customer_reviews.title: We all should use these!
customer_reviews.text: These reusable bags work great. Produce can be scanned, they open & close easily, I appreciate having multiple sizes -- and most of all, I enjoy not using throwaway plastic. I know that's a small thing, but might as well start somewhere. Not buying anything in plastic has become a bit of a game at the grocery store. I also like the # of bags in this package. I have a family of 3; right now there are a few bags in my husband's car, a few bags in the fridge, and still several in my car, ready to load up some produce!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea. I bought my some for my brother
customer_reviews.text: He loved the idea, so he gave half to his son who loved the idea. GREAT IDEA, I hate wasting those flimsy bags. I hate putting clean vegetables on a fecal contaminated shopping cart, so you have to wrap them. I haven't used mine yet, they are in my car, but I expect to use them this week. They are light and come in several sizes, they appear to be well made, so time will tell. GREAT GIFT IDEA and affordable for your vegetarian pals.
customer_reviews.author: C. Braden

customer_reviews.title: Handy Bags for Produce!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are just about perfect. I wish they were a bit easier to clean, but that may be asking too much of mesh. Onions, in particular, shed a bit in the bags, and the small bits are a little tough to wash out. Other than that, these are terrific bags. I keep half of them in my car, along with my recycled grocery bags. Half of them are kept in a drawer for a miscellaneous home needs I may have. A great purchase and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine L.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and eco friendly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with the intent to use a little less plastic - and so far, that has been a success. The produce that I've put in the bags seems to be lasting fine in my fridge, and they are pretty easy to clean once they've been used. I just wash them in the sink when I do other dishes, and dry them on the counter. All in all, these bags work well. My biggest issue - remembering to bring them with me to the store. I'm getting better. It's a process.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette K. Engel

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing vegetables and fruits
customer_reviews.text: Use these for all my fruits and vegetables now. It is so nice to just grab the bag from the refrigerator drawer and I do believe the food keeps fresh longer. Have not had a single thing rot in the bags yet, so I figure it has extended the storage time. Easy to clean. Especially nice for cukes, apples, onions, broccoli and grapes. Highly recommend these as they are a good mix of sizes. Will be ordering more as I like them for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good quality nice features
customer_reviews.text: Just received my set of 15 reusable bags. I like that there are 3 different sizes and the material will clean very nicely in the washing machine. I’ve not had the opportunity to use these bags but was happy to see that the pull strings on the bags all have a little toggle that secures the bags so that they won’t open it allow produce to fall out. Can’t wait to use my bags! A great value for the price and I’m glad. It to be surrounding my food with unhealthy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever....love these bags.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. First I don't have to wait in line to get plastic bags. No plastic bags filling up my trash or the landfill. Major bonus, the food stays fresher in .y refrigerator longer. That was unexpected. If they get dirty, throw them in the wash with your kitchen towels...good as new. Love this idea. So far one set has been more than enough. But I'm not against buying another set for the summer veggies and fruits.
customer_reviews.author: S. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I will use these a lot more after the coronavirus situation calms down. Our stores are asking us to stop using the reusable bags for now. However, before this all hit, I was enjoying having them. It is easy to see what you have in the bag. There is airflow so it seemed that the produce didn’t spoil as quickly at home. And I felt socially responsible while shopping that I wasn’t using all those single-use bags any more. Looking forward to being able to use these again.
customer_reviews.author: J Clark

customer_reviews.title: Let’s save the planet together with some fun alternatives!
customer_reviews.text: My in-laws are setting a great example of reusable items to save the planet. I have so much trouble opening those plastic produce bags at the store, but I thought these bags would be a great alternative. They are! They seem quite sturdy, but multiple uses will tell. Even the smallest size can fit several avocados. What a snap to clean; swoosh them around in some soapy water & simply hang them out to dry! You can also put them on lowest heat setting in the dryer if it is raining outside
customer_reviews.author: D Dee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy mesh bags with no issues so far
customer_reviews.text: We love these mesh bags. We use them for all of our produce. These bags have held up over the last few months with no issues. I love that the colors on the tags correspond to the size of the bag so that you know how big it is when searching through to see which one you need to pull out. Before we purchased these, we were storing our vegetables in plastic bags. I can’t believe we never switched over sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Ames Eggerbee

customer_reviews.title: Well-Constructed Bags That Keeps Produce FRESH!
customer_reviews.text: These produce bags are very easy to clean and they really do keep produce fresh! I love salads but I have to buy large quantities of greens when I go to the store (trying to cut down the number of trips during this pandemic). I dump all of the greens into these bags, place them in the Crisper bins in my refrigerator and they stay fresh FAR longer than when I keep them in their original packages.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorQ

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping produce fresh
customer_reviews.text: These bags have not only kept my produce fresh but also separated them so I could find them easier in my fridge. My refrigerator never looked so neat and tidy. I may try wrapping leafy vegetables in a moist paper towel before storing in the bag, as I think they need a bit more moisture to stay fresh. I also like the fact I can wash and reuse the bags. I have ordered two more sets to give to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color coding & visibility through bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the light weight see-through bags that are color coded for size. I folded each separately so that I could easily pull out the correct size for each produce item. For individual items like green pepper, avocado, etc. I just put all in one bag and easily take out each to weigh at checkout. LOVE not using plastic bags!!!! I stopped using any plastic bags at grocery store long ago by using my cart or shopping bags.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: I love these.
customer_reviews.text: I love these for produce shopping. No more of those hard-to open, polluting plastic bags. Sometimes the scanner can't read the SKU codes through the fabric, but easily solved by keeping the barcode toward the bag opening. I can see these as being used as lingerie bags in the washer, with the cord tucked inside so it doesn't get tangled. Maybe even to hold small things In the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Less plastic.  Less waste. Super convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! The sizes are perfect for any and all produce!! The larger bags can fit anything you can find at the supermarket. I love knowing I am not just using a piece of plastic just once to move my fresh food from the store to my fridge only to throw it away... If you care about the environment like I do, these are great for reducing the use of plastic. I place them with my shopping bags so that they are always handy. This set comes with more than enough to buy all the vegetables and fruits you can want. SO HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie O.

customer_reviews.title: Superb vegetable bag replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous vegetable bags. Very strong, drawstring is great. Appears that they will last just about forever, and I love using them. Weight of large size is 0.4 oz. I bought the large size because that was the size of the plastic store vegetable bags I had been using. I should have bought the combo set of large, medium and small bags. Fifteen large bags way more than I need, and for many items, a medium or small size would be a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Produce reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. When I grocery shop I hate to use the single use plastic bags. This product replaces that, and they work very well. They are strong and durable. You can see clearly what is inside and they are color coded so you know what size they are. The large bags are very big. The medium is bug enough for romaine lettuce, apples etc. The small ones are very handsome as well. Yesterday I used the small for three apples, with room left over. All in all, a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Booth

customer_reviews.title: Great to organize - in and out of the fridge
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these to sort food in the fridge to make it easier to meal plan while sheltering in place. Can sort ingredients for a meal or dish into each and just pull out what I need when it's time to cook. When I was using Blue Apron or Dinnerly it was a great way to keep things together. They've survived multiple washings without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: MKS

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: As most people I wanted to reduce my use of plastic. I bought these reusable produce bags and upon the reviews I wasn't super convinced because I was reading the not so good reviews also. However, everyone's experience is different. I love these bags I use them every time I go to the market. The small ones fit many things fruits, veggies, beans, and rice they are super convenient. You can wash them or wash whatever you are carrying in them and they are super easy to use and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much!! Not much I can add to the other reviews already out but I’m so happy I purchased them. It will be nice to have different sizes to use when getting my produce. Well made, lightweight and I love the closure. Also love that I can keep them all in their own mesh storage bag. And most of all I love that I’m lowering my plastic waste contribution in this world. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Kennah

customer_reviews.title: Good produce bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of 15 produce bags to put my vegetables into after washing them. (Plastic grocery store bags retain excess moisture so the produce does not keep as well.) These bags are a breathable mesh with small pores, so the excess water evaporates, but so far, in the crisper the vegetables have not gotten too dried out either. The bags are sturdy and look like they will hold up through many uses. So far, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Y

customer_reviews.title: The best produce bags at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for minimizing waste. These produce bags are amazing! Soft strong fabric made well and we definitely use them for more than produce bags. You get a ton of different sizes, you can store them all in one of the bags and you can fold it up easily to fit in your bag. Also a great functional, earth friendly gift.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: good on the environment but hoping we can continue to improve the design
customer_reviews.text: i like the bags but truthfully could have used less bags. for those of you who are deciding to convert to reuseable keep in mind these wont keep water in. so if you have a veg like aspargus and like to keep a paper towel with water it wont work well as water wont stay on the bag. also i have found things wilt more with these then plastic bags. just something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and practical
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for over a month on a regular basis. The color codes make it easy to pull out the correct size when I am shopping for veggies and fruit. I usually wash the produce while still in the bag, let it drain and then toss in the fridge. They are easy to see through, and easy to clean. I’ll be taking these with me to my local farmers market this season.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Love these produce bags
customer_reviews.text: I had been considering these bags for awhile. An advertisement came up on Facebook and I made the mistake of ordering them from Outdoors Tribe. During the checkout process additional products were suggested, somehow the order grew and quadrupled. There was no way to cancel the order. I had to get my bank to get involved. I decided to purchase these produce bags from my reliable Amazon company. I am very satisfied. I love replacing the plastic bags with these wonderful bags. This recycler is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: pansy

customer_reviews.title: I hated the mess in my fridge from produce until I bought these
customer_reviews.text: First I’m not paid to make this review!!! Honestly I love these bags! My fridge was always a mess with produce and the plastic bags that I kept them in the fridge with would make them go bad quicker. These bags make my produce last longer and I love them! I would bring them to the grocery to put them in initially but due to coved I still buy them in the plastic then transfer them at home into these! Washable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Bags are very nice. Thy seem perfect for produce. I haven't used them yet as they just arrived. I like that they come in a pouch for taking into the store so one is sure to have enough bags as one never knows how much produce will be purchased. I live in NY where we are going to need our own bags to replace plastic ones the store used to use. these fit the bill
customer_reviews.author: Judith Poss

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: These are great to take to the grocery store. Very lightweight and tare weight tag is super helpful. Easy to wash and reuse. We leave them stashed in our reusable grocery bins to ensure we don't forget to take them along with us when shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Manning

customer_reviews.title: Reuseable Produce bags
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of a reusable produce bag. I don't like using the ones the stores provide because then I have to through them out when I'm finished with them. They just wind up in the land fill. You only use them for a short time so these reusable ones are better, plus they can be use for different tings too. I use them to wash my pantyhose and some finer things in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: bier1

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to plastic bags.
customer_reviews.text: These are great when shopping for and storing vegetables. The 3 sized are generous and it comes with lots of bags. I’m sure there are many other uses for them as well. And you can throw them into the washing machine and dryer to clean. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine K.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for storage
customer_reviews.text: Not good to leave your green veggies in. They wilt quickly. Great for just transport, but not storage,
customer_reviews.author: cindy's crazy life

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good (way better than plastic waste)
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe it took me so long to order some of these. We have been using them regularly with no issues. Well one cashier was weird about it...bless her heart. The only issue I had, was REALLY minor. We had broccoli in one, and when I was trying to wash it, those teeny little buds got kinda caught in the mesh seams? I worked it out. Otherwise so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Produce Bags
customer_reviews.text: These work just as advertised. They are light yet sturdy. They add a minuscule amount of weight so even if you shop at a place that won't tare the weight the difference in price is negligible. I take them with me to the supermarket and they are sturdy, you can clearly see through them, and the zip tie thingy works awesome. I even put bare quinoa in there and not once has it spilled. I like that I can rinse the produce without even taking it out of the bag. I have purchased more of these to give out to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Frank D.

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd order
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags so much, I actually bought the 2nd set so that if people asked about them in the grocery store (which they did so often), I could hand them one to have to spread the love that is green. BUT, that was before virus worries .... Anyway. I really appreciate not having the plastic and these bags are really light weight and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brock

customer_reviews.title: Good value, accepted by grocery store cashiers without any issues
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bags that look like they will hold up. Price was reasonable, for how many bags you get. I like that the different sizes are different colors, to make it easy to fish out the size you want. Grocery store cashiers have not had any issues identifying the contents when scanning at check-out. Bought a second set to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel in Washington

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are retry great. They weigh next to nothing, so they won’t add any weight to your produce purchases, and the drawstrings and seams are sturdy and well constructed. The various sizes are really handy—some are big enough for celery while others are perfect for shallots or herbs. Can easily be thrown in the washer and they fold up nicely to fit into one of the smallest bags. I’m really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: With a great harvest of garden bounty, this product is must have! We are able to clean, separate and store our veg and the color-coded strings really help. We enjoyed the washable mesh bags so much we ordered a second set. Items arrived swiftly both times. Would make an excellent gift for an active gardener or farmer's market shopper.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Fraher

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for travel! I put my undergarments I side them. They are great for laundry to! They are made of strong netting so you can pack them! they toggles are strong and durable and last in the wash also ( tuck them Inside the hole and throw the whole bag into the washer/ dryer so they don’t get tangled with other items in the wash. I have also used them in the dryer as my bra bag! Works greet!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Knecht

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing farm share veggies
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to store the veggies we get in our weekly farm share and they’ve worked out well so far. It’s helpful to have three different sizes. I throw them right in the washer and let them air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lobteacher

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a grocery store where we still have plastic produce bags an I have seen so many customers come in and out even dry grocery products in them. This upsets me so much because I see so much waste in a grocery store that average consumers don’t. I ordered these because I wasn’t trying to save the environment or be one of those cool kids to save the turtles. I simply bought them to resume them over and over again. Highly recommend these if you constantly buying produce with plastic bags and are annoyed when they break over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: zulanele

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to reduce my plastic bag consumption for produce. The various sizes are great! Drawstring makes these very easy to close. These mesh bags allows your produce to "breathe" so they do not get the condensation that you would ordinarily get with plastic bags. So far the 15 bag variety pack has served me well, but if I am needing more will definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rodriguez Family Account

customer_reviews.title: Helps me not have to wash my groceries upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been washing my groceries to prevent the virus from contaminating my fridge. This is a lifesaver. I don’t have to wash them anymore. I just trash the grocery bags and put my veggies in these mesh bags instead.
customer_reviews.author: azadeh keyvani

customer_reviews.title: Every little bit helps
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these reusable produce bags for awhile - wanted to see how they held up and washed before reviewing. Mine have been holding up like champs! I must disclose that I stick them all in the largest bag so they stay all together in the wash. I keep a few in each of my reusable shopping bags so I can't forget them.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Great value on an eco-friendly product
customer_reviews.text: I have never been a fan of plastic produce bags; they're flimsy and they harm the environment. An online ad clued me in to mesh bags, so I shopped here on Amazon and chose this set. They are perfect! I haven't used them long enough to remember which color is for which size, but they're sturdy, easy to see through for scanning, and they're easy to clean. I have been telling friends about them as well. I bought the set with 5 of each size. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: The Good Life

customer_reviews.title: makes veggies dry
customer_reviews.text: not very useful. these suck the moisture out of the veggies and make them dull and dry. specially green vegetables. cant use them anymore because of this :(
customer_reviews.author: Abhinav

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packaging
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and I'm happy to give up on the awful flimsy green produce bags that hold almost nothing. However the packaging they came in was so hard to open that I had to cut it, which also meant I ended up cutting one bag with a small cut. That was disappointing but I couldn't tear the packaging or even pull it open at the glue.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Miller

customer_reviews.title: environment friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. I am trying to go as green as possible. Using these bags instead of plastic bags are reducing plastic loads on the environment. These are pretty sturdy, very easy to clean. Just toss them in the laundry (inside out). I love the fact that you can clearly see through. It helps when I keep veggies in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Garden_Lover

product_meta.title: Ecowaare Set of 15 Reusable Mesh Produce Bags,3 Sizes Washable and See-Through Grogery Bags,with Colorful Tare Weight Tags,5 Small 5 Medium & 5 Large
feature_bullets: Multiple Sizes Meet All You Need --- 3 sizes makes them very versatile,yellow is small 12"×8", green is medium 12"×14", and red is large 12"×17", just take one from the bundle easily by its color and you have the correct bag to use; Great not only for veggies and fruit, but also great for toys, bulk grain or fragile produce.

Safety and Lightweight --- BPA free and 100% food contact safe, with the highest standards of quality, safely hold all your produce. Made of ultra fine yet strong mesh polyester, the mesh bag is super lightweight that it won't add weight to your produce.

Zero Waste and Eco-friendly --- Great addition to your goal of helping the environment,and each mesh bags have the potential to eliminate up to 1000 plastic bags over it's lifetime. Our produce bags are not leafy green vegetable storage bags, it can't keep vegetable fresher, our goal is to reduce the use of plastic.

Convenient and Easy to Clean --- These produce bags are easy to open and close with drawstring toggle closure; Colorful drawstrings and tags help to keep you more organized;Easy to clean, just rinse it with water or wash them with the rest of your laundry, then they are good to go again, no problem!

Scan Through Easily --- Unlike most non-transparent mesh bags from other brands, our produce bags is nearly transparent so you can easily see through the bag to know what's inside;bar-codes will scan right in the bag so that the cashier will be able to see the item numbers and also make your checkout faster.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars11,182 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
